Wheeljack::

Wheeljack looked to Orchestral, he was more interesting now "Hummm, 
that sounds interesting Orchestra. Can you tell me more about it?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Orchestra::
> 
> Orchestra tried to use his quick-thinking again.
> 
> "Well, we may be able to enhance the technology in it of containing 
a spark.
> You see, we might be able to make it so that the container can even 
modify
> the spark, or heal it.  We can add extra features like that.  And a 
whole
> bunch more complex activities may be done with it," Orchestra said.
